infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs your location to display nearby places.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app needs your location in the background to provide notifications for nearby places.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: We require your location to provide location-based features.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: We need access to your photo library to upload images.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: We need access to your camera to take photos for the app.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: This app uses motion data to enhance the user experience.
